title: (x) Condensed square sans 3615 Club Honda logo - Agency {Yves}
content:
Hi everybody!  
This time I need an help...and will not be so easy!

I've to reproduce a sticker made between 1989 and 1992 for the Honda Africa Twin that participated at the the competition Paris - Dakar.  
The only photography I found on the web is this (as you can see the resolution is not so high...):

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018212415im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AAA_5632.jpg)

Can you suggest from which font I can start? I've really no idea!  
Thank you in advance!
author: Filippo

comments.content: Start with a bold condensed weight of [Agency](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018212415/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/agency/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=36&sample_text=3615%20CLUB%20HONDA&ft=liga).

Yeah!

The Agency Black Condensed seems to be the real right one...and I read that it was created in 1990 and so in those years! Thank you very very much! :-)
